content: crochet tunik size 14-16 uk 42-44eu difficulty difficult material java on-line 60% cotton 40% viskoza 158m/50gr 6 balls crochet hook number 3 needle knitting mill to make tube instruction tunic is crochet in two parts first upper part with direction from underbreast upwards then lower part with direction from underbreast down upper part start with „free crocheting exact to double_crochet please see picture 1 nad 2 224 double_crochet picture 1 and 2 crochet tape finish with main stitch and make circle please be carefull to not cross circle continue with pattern below picture 3 triangle in first row make not finished double_crochet skip 4 double_crochet from last row 1 not finished double_crochet and finish together with first not finished double_crochet continue around and in next row continue as patten says flower first double_crochet 3chains 2double crochet in the same place /right foliole/ 3not finished double_crochet in place of first double_crochet 3double crochet in next tip of triangle and all double_crochet finish together 3 chains and 2 not finished double_crochet in the middle of flower double crochet in to the next tip of triangle and all finish in one round has flower only half part flower has four folioles in next round we make two others foliole not finished double_crochet in the middle of flower 3 not finished double_crochet finish together 4 chains 3 not finished double_crochet in the middle of flower 1 not finished double_crochet and finish together pattern consist of triangle row and two flower row still repeat in high of 8cm we separate work into two parts and start to make neckline www e-pletení cz continue in right and back side from left and right of neckline we skip each time one triangel in high of 12cm we separe work into right front part left front part and back part work separately left front side in top shaping skip 3 triangles and then from left and right side skip 1 triangel in high 29cm finish work right front side crochet same as left part back part on both sides we skip 3 triangels for top shaping in next row skip 5x1 tiangel then skip 12 middle triangels and make straps separately left back strap skip from right side 5x1 triangel from left side 3x1 triangel and in high 29cm finish work left back strap reverse as right strap straps sew or crochet together top shaping and neckline crochet with one row of double_crochet and pickots picture below pickot 3x4 chains add together in one single_crochet be carreful with crocheting around neckline you have to make pickots symetrical lower part of tunic crochet as pattern below first round is made from trebble crochet you will need 13 tops around to make tunic long enough you have to repeat 6 round for 11 times finishing on knitting mill make tube and pull through trebble crochet www e-pletení cz
